trait.name: Atac en Picat
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a atac armat cos a cos, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage to the target.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Summon Air Elemental
entries: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an {@creature air elemental}. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The aboleth pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepatia
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany d'àcid every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Enslave (3/Dia)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be magically {@condition fascinat} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition fascinat} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition fascinat} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The aboleth makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Cop de Cua
entries: The aboleth makes one atac de cua.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: One creature {@condition fascinat} by the aboleth takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: Si the yeti rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The yeti has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} against this magic or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de fred and then be {@condition paralitzat} for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to this yeti's gaze for 1 hour.

action.name: Alè Gèlid {@recharge}
entries: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The acolyte és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 1. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the dragon falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Tota criatura designada pel drac que es trobi a 120 peus seus i que sàpiga de la seva presència ha de salvar per Saviesa {@dc 16}. Qui falli estarà {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a la Presència Aterradora del drac durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The dragon makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: The dragon fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The dragon bat les ales. Tota criatura a 10 peus seus ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19} o rebre 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany contundent i esdevenir {@condition enderrocat}. Llavors The dragon pot volar fins la meitat de la seva velocitat de vol.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the dracolich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dracolich té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dracolich can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a dracolich's Presència Aterradora durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The dracolich exhala lamps en una línia de 90 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The dracolich makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: The dracolich fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21} or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.

items.name: Sleep Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales sleep gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} or fall {@condition inconscient} for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

items.name: Alè Foragitant.
items.entry: The dragon exhales repulsion energy en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli serà empès 60 peus, allunyant-se del drac.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

En una forma nova the dragon retè el seu alineament, punts de vida, daus de vida, parla, competències, Reistències Llegendàries, accions de llar, puntuacions d'Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma, i aquesta acció. La resta d'estadístiques seran les de la nova forma, exceptuant habilitas de classe o accions llegendàries que la nova forma tingui.

Si falla, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a la Presència Aterradora del drac durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 56 ({@damage 16d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The dragon makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: The dragon fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The dragon bat les ales. Tota criatura a 10 peus seus ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19} o rebre 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany contundent i esdevenir {@condition enderrocat}. Llavors The dragon pot volar fins la meitat de la seva velocitat de vol.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the dragon falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

entries: Tota criatura designada pel drac que es trobi a 120 peus seus i que sàpiga de la seva presència ha de salvar per Saviesa {@dc 18}. Qui falli estarà {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi. action.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè Gèlid.
items.entry: The dragon exhales an icy blast en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 58 ({@damage 13d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

En una forma nova the dragon retè el seu alineament, punts de vida, daus de vida, parla, competències, Reistències Llegendàries, accions de llar, puntuacions d'Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma, i aquesta acció. La resta d'estadístiques seran les de la nova forma, exceptuant habilitas de classe o accions llegendàries que la nova forma tingui.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, terreny difícil composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13}. On a failure, a target takes 15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) de dany contundent and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.
If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the dany contundent and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el allosaurus es mou, com a mínim, 30 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el allosaurus pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

items.name: Slowing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 22}. Si falla, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last durant 1 minut. The creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Tota criatura designada pel drac que es trobi a 120 peus seus i que sàpiga de la seva presència ha de salvar per Saviesa {@dc 24}. Qui falli estarà {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a la Presència Aterradora del drac durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè de Foc.
items.entry: The dragon exhales fire en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 24}. Qui falli rep 71 ({@damage 13d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Weakening Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 24} or have disadvantage on Força-based attack rolls, Força checks, and Força saving throws durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

En una forma nova the dragon retè el seu alineament, punts de vida, daus de vida, parla, competències, Reistències Llegendàries, accions de llar, puntuacions d'Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma, i aquesta acció. La resta d'estadístiques seran les de la nova forma, exceptuant habilitas de classe o accions llegendàries que la nova forma tingui.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The dragon makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: The dragon fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The dragon bat les ales. Tota criatura a 15 peus seus ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 25} o rebre 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) de dany contundent i esdevenir {@condition enderrocat}. Llavors The dragon pot volar fins la meitat de la seva velocitat de vol.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the dragon falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 24} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, terreny difícil composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

entries: Si the dragon falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: The dragon makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: The dragon fa un atac Cua.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sphinx és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Inescrutable
entries: L'esfinx és immune a efectes per a detectar pensaments i emocions, i qualsevol encanteri de divinació que rebutgi. Les tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa (Perspicàcia) tenen desavantatge.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The sphinx's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sphinx fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Roar (3/Dia)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a long rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 500 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

items.name: First Roar
items.entry: Each creature that fails a {@dc 18} Saviesa saving throw is {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Second Roar
items.entry: Each creature that fails a {@dc 18} Saviesa saving throw is {@condition eixordat} and {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. A {@condition acovardit} creature is {@condition paralitzat} and can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Third Roar
items.entry: Each creature makes a {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw. Qui falli rep 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany de tro i està {@condition enderrocat}. Si supera en rep la meitat i no està {@condition enderrocat}.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

monster.name: Animated Armor
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The armor is {@condition incapacitat} while in the area of an camp antimàgic. If targeted by dissipar màgia, the armor must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si armor es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal suit of armor.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The armor fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar). Mentre duri aquesta presa, the ankheg can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 25/50 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The arcanaloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 15} per salvar conjur). The arcanaloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The arcanaloth és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 16. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The arcanaloth has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The arcanaloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The arcanaloth's són màgics.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany tallant. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The arcanaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
An arcanaloth has a {@chance 40|40 percent|40% summoning chance} chance of summoning one arcanaloth.

A summoned yugoloth apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The archmage is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The archmage can cast {@spell ego camuflatge} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: *The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The archmage té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Familiars
entries: Any spellcaster that can cast the {@spell trobar familiar} spell (such as an archmage or mage) is likely to have a familiar. The familiar can be one of the creatures described in the spell (see the Player's Handbook) or some other Tiny monster, such as a {@creature ma reptadora}, {@creature imp}, {@creature pseudodragon}, o {@creature quasit}.

monster.name: Assassí
idiomes: Argot de Lladres plus any two languages

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitat} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Awakened Shrub
idiomes: one language known by its creator

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si shrub es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal shrub.

action.name: Rake
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Awakened Tree
idiomes: one language known by its creator

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si tree es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal tree.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Escalfor Corporal
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany contundent si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The baboon té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de baboon's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The badger has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Acaballes de la Mortalitat
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 70 ({@damage 20d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area que ningú estigui portant o vestint, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: A l'inici de cada torn de the balor, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc, and flammable objects in the aura que ningú estigui portant o vestint ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The balor té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The balor's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The balor fa dos atacs: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany elèctric. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Força amb {@dc 20} o be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A balor has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d8} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d6} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, {@dice 1d4} {@creature glabrezu||glabrezus}, {@dice 1d3} {@creature nalfeshnee||nalfeshnees}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature marilith||mariliths}, or one {@creature goristro}.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The banshee pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Albir Terrorífic
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. A {@condition acovardit} target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Albir Terrorífic durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Wail (1/Dia)
entries: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. On a failure, a creature es queda a 0 punts de vida. On a success, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: A l'inici de cada torn seu, the barbed devil deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant to any creature grappling it.

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Tirar Flama twice.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tirar Flama
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc. Si l'objectiu és un objecte inflamable que no és dut ni vestit, s'encèn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The barlgura's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). The barlgura pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, the barlgura can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The barlgura's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The barlgura fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its fists.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A barlgura has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one barlgura.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw if the basilisk isn't {@condition incapacitat}. Si falla, the creature magically begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrificat} until freed by the  {@spell restabliment superior} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The bat can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition eixordat}.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The bat has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: The devil can't be {@condition acovardit} while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 12} o estar {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target can't regain hit points. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points a l'inici de cada torn seu due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 12} Saviesa (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The behir fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany tallant. The target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} mentre duri aquesta presa.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition encegat} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls {@condition enderrocat} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

monster.name: Beholder

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The beholder's central eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the {@spell camp antimàgic} spell, en un con de 150 peus. A l'inici de cada torn seu, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the beholder's own eye rays.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rajos d'Ull
entries: The beholder shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Charm Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition fascinat} by the beholder for 1 hour, or until the beholder harms the creature.

items.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 4. Slowing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the target's speed is halved durant 1 minut. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 5. Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 6. Telekinetic Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or the beholder moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. It is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder is {@condition incapacitat}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The beholder can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

items.name: 7. Sleep Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or fall asleep and remain {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut. The target awakens if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it. This ray has no effect on constructs and undead.

items.name: 8. Petrification Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the creature begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrificat} until freed by the  {@spell restabliment superior} spell or other magic.

items.name: 9. Disintegration Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16} or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de força. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

items.name: 10. Death Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16} or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany necròtic. The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 hit points.

legendaryHeader: The beholder can take 3 legendary actions, using the Raig d'Ull option below. It can take only one legendary action at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The beholder regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Raig d'Ull
entries: The beholder uses one random eye ray.

monster.name: Beholder Zombie
idiomes: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: Si hi ha dany que redueix al zombi a 0 punts de vida, ha de salvar Constitució amb CD de 5 + el dany rebut (si el dany no és radiant o crític). Si supera, el zombi es queda amb 1 punt de cop i no 0.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Raig d'Ull
entries: The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.

items.name: 1. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 2. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Enervation Ray.
items.entry: The targeted creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 4. Disintegration Ray.
entries: If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or take 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de força. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust.

If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger nonmagical object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, the berserker can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The bear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The bear fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 15 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Black Pudding
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The pudding pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany d'àcid. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The pudding pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new pudding has hit points equal to half the original pudding's, (arrodoneix a la baixa). New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

monster.name: Blink Dog
idiomes: understands Silvà but can't speak it

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The dog has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The hawk té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de hawk's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhala lamps en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its punts de vida màxims is reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's punts de vida màxims to 0, the target instantly transforms into a red slaad or, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level or higher, a green slaad. Only a {@spell desig} spell can reverse the transformation.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition fascinat} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell engarjolament}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell desig} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell restabliment superior} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitat} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the boar es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un tusk, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 11} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Implacable (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Si the boar rep 7 de dany o menys i això el deixa a 0 punts de vida, es queda a 1 punt de cop.

action.name: Ullal
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa tres atacs: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 14} o become {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

variant.name: Diable d'Ossos Polearm
entries: Some diables d'ossos have the following action options.

entries.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs: one with its hooked polearm and one with its sting.

entries.name: Hooked Polearm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Mentre duri aquesta presa, the devil can't use its polearm on another target.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa, and it has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència, and it has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè de Foc.
items.entry: The dragon exhala foc en una línia de 20 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Sleep Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales sleep gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11} or fall {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè Elèctric.
items.entry: The dragon exhala lamps en una línia de 40 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alè Foragitant.
items.entry: The dragon exhales repulsion energy en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli serà empès 30 peus, allunyant-se del drac.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The bear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The bear fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: Si the bugbear sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant in melee or 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant at range.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: Si the bugbear sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Heart of Hruggek
entries: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition paralitzat}, {@condition emmetzinat}, {@condition atordit}, or put to sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The bugbear fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant in melee or 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant at range.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The bulette pot arribar a saltar 30 peus de longitud i 15 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 16} Força or Destresa saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition enderrocat} and take 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany tallant. Si supera, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition enderrocat}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition enderrocat} in the bulette's space.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The batrac pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Parlar amb Granotes i amb Gripaus
entries: The batrac can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Batrac.

trait.name: Camuflatge dels Aiguamolls
entries: The batrac has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The batrac pot arribar a saltar 20 peus de longitud i 10 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The batrac makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The cambion's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). The cambion pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of the cambion includes its Carisma bonus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be magically {@condition fascinat} for 1 day. The {@condition fascinat} target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

variant.name: Demonic Cambions
entries: Few demons consort with mortals, and those with the charm or desire to usually grant their cambion children the Fiendish Charm ability. Cultists of Baphomet and Orcus can also use foul rituals to infuse their master's strength into a young or unborn child, yielding a cult champion who can wield special abilities; a cambion linked to Orcus replaces Fiendish Charm with Spawn of the Grave, and one linked to Baphomet replaces it with Horned One's Call.

entries.name: Horned One's Call
entries: When the cambion targets only one creature with the attacks of its Multiattack, it can choose one ally it can see within 30 feet. That ally can use its reaction to make one melee attack against a target of its choice.

entries.name: Spawn of the Grave
entries: Al final de cada torn de the cambion, each undead of its choice that it can see within 30 feet gains 10 temporary hit points, provided the cambion isn't {@condition incapacitat}.
In addition, this cambion can use its Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs Innata to cast {@spell animar els morts} three times per day.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The carrion crawler has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The carrion crawler pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The carrion crawler fa dos atacs: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o estar {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralitzat}. The target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the poison on itself on a success.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The cat has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The bear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The bear fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the centaure es mou 30 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un pike, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The centaure fa dos atacs: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs with its chains.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant. The target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant a l'inici de cada torn seu.

action.name: Animate Chains (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.

Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is {@condition incapacitat} or dies.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition acovardit} until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Drone
entries: The chasme produces a horrid droning sound to which demons are immune. Any other creature that starts its turn with in 30 feet of the chasme ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or fall {@condition inconscient} for 10 minutes. A creature that can't hear the drone automatically succeeds on the save. The effect on the creature ends if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to splash it with holy water. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, it is immune to the drone for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The chasme té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The chasme pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany necròtic, and els punts de vida màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut. If this effect reduces a creature's punts de vida màxims to 0, the creature dies. This reduction to a creature's punts de vida màxims lasts until the creature finishes a long rest or until it is affected by a spell like  {@spell restabliment superior}.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A chasme has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one chasme.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Quimera
idiomes: understands Dracònic però no pot parlar

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chimera fa tres atacs: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its alè de foc is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Banyes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 31 ({@damage 7d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Chuul
idiomes: understands Deep Speech però no pot parlar

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The chuul pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detectar màgia spell but isn't itself magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. The target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the chuul ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition paralitzat}. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Clay Gòlem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Acid Absorption
entries: Whenever the gòlem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

trait.name: Bersèrk
entries: Quan el gòlem comenci el seu torn amb 60 punts de vida o menys, tira {@dice d6}. Si surt un 6 el gòlem es torna bersèrk. A cada torn així ataca a la criatura que tingui més a prop i pugui veure. Si no n'hi ha cap prou a prop per moure's i atacar-la, atacarà a un objecte (preferentment més petit). Quan el gòlem sigui bersèrk no parara fins que sigui destruit o recuperi tots els punts de vida.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The gòlem és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The gòlem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The gòlem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gòlem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or have its punts de vida màxims reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its punts de vida màxims to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the  {@spell restabliment superior} spell or other magic.

action.name: Haste {@recharge 5}
entries: Fins el final del seu proper torn. the gòlem magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Destresa saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (arrodoneix a la baixa). and that creature takes the other half.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cloaker fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it. If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is {@condition encegat} and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a {@dc 16} Força check.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Moan
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or become {@condition acovardit} until the end of the cloaker's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Phantasms (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.
