5–6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a {@dc 11} Saviesa saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc a l'inici de cada torn seu.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Fins que una criatura, com a acció, apagui el foc, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc a l'inici de cada torn seu.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult fire giants are trained to lay siege to strongholds and break through enemy lines. These abilities are represented by the following traits.

entries.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The giant fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

entries.name: Tackle
entries: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 19} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

monster.name: Fire Snake
idiomes: understands Ignan però no pot parlar

trait.name: Escalfor Corporal
entries: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The snake fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The flameskull és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The flameskull té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dissipar màgia or {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell is cast on them.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

monster.name: Flesh Gòlem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bersèrk
entries: Quan el gòlem comenci el seu torn amb 40 punts de vida o menys, tira {@dice d6}. Si surt un 6 el gòlem es torna bersèrk. A cada torn així ataca a la criatura que tingui més a prop i pugui veure. Si no n'hi ha cap prou a prop per moure's i atacar-la, atacarà a un objecte (preferentment més petit). Quan el gòlem sigui bersèrk no parara fins que sigui destruit o recuperi tots els punts de vida.

Si el creador del gòlem hi és a 60 peus d'abast pot intentar calmar-lo com a acció. El gòlem l'ha de poder sentir. El creador farà una tirada de Carisma (Persuasión) amb {@dc 15}. Si supera, el bersèrk s'acaba pel gòlem. Si el gòlem torna a rebre mal estant a 40 punts de vida o menys, pot tornar a activar-se el bersèrk.

trait.name: Aversió al Foc
entries: Si the gòlem rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The gòlem és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Quan the gòlem hagi de rebre dany elèctric, no rep mal sinò que recupera la meitat de dany elèctric en punts de vida.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The gòlem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The gòlem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gòlem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Flumph
idiomes: understands Undercommon però no pot parlar

trait.name: Advanced Telepatia
entries: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the flumph is knocked {@condition enderrocat}, roll a die. On an odd result, the flumph lands upside-down i està {@condition incapacitat}. Al final de cada torn seu, the flumph can make a {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw, righting itself and ending the {@condition incapacitat} condition if it succeeds.

trait.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The flumph is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany d'àcid. Al final de cada torn seu, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10}, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany d'àcid on a failure or ending the recurring acid damage on a success. A {@spell restabliment menor} spell cast on the target also ends the recurring acid damage.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Dia)
entries: Each creature en un con de 15 peus originating from the flumph ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10} or be coated in a foul-smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for {@dice 1d4} hours. The coated creature is {@condition emmetzinat} as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are {@condition emmetzinat} while with in 5 feet of the coated creature. A creature can remove the stench on itself by using a short rest to bathe in water, alcohol, or vinegar.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The snake no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 3d4}) de dany de verí.

monster.name: Flying Sword
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The sword is {@condition incapacitat} while in the area of an camp antimàgic. If targeted by dissipar màgia, the sword must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fomorian attacks twice with its greatclub or makes one greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Evil Eye
entries: The fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within 60 feet of it to make a {@dc 14} Carisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Curse of the Evil Eye (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: With a stare, the fomorian uses Evil Eye, but si falla, the creature is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Força or Destresa.
The transformed creature can repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The frog pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The frog pot arribar a saltar 10 peus de longitud i 5 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult frost giants are skilled hunters who construct and hurl nets weighted down with fragments of metal or bone. This ability is represented by the following action option.

entries.name: Weighted Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Força check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

walk.condition: (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si galeb duhr es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal boulder.

trait.name: Rolling Charge
entries: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Animate Boulders (1/Dia)
entries: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intel·ligència 1 and Carisma 1, it can't be {@condition fascinat} or {@condition acovardit}, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the gargoyle es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un inanimate statue .

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gargoyle fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Gas Spore
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: The gas spore explodes when it es queda a 0 punts de vida. Each creature within 20 feet of ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the {@condition emmetzinat} condition are immune to this disease.

Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to {@dice 1d12} + the creature's Constitució score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes {@condition emmetzinat} for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts {@dice 2d4} Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

trait.name: Eerie Resemblance
entries: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful {@dc 15} Intel·ligència (Nature) check.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 poison damage, i la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or become infected with the disease described in the Cadàver Detonant trait.

monster.name: Gelatinous Cube
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Ooze Cube
entries: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.
Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful {@dc 12} Força check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.
The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

trait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful {@dc 15} Saviesa (Percepció) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, la criatura ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}.
Si supera, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

Si falla, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is {@condition restrained}, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 12} Força check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition emmetzinat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turn Defiance
entries: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature other than an undead, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Ghost
idiomes: tot idioma que comprenia en vida

trait.name: Visió Etèrea
entries: The ghost pot veure el Pla Etèri fins a 60 peus d'abast quan està al Pla Material (i viceversa).

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The ghost pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

action.name: Toc Pansidor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The ghost entra el Pla Etèri des del Pla Material (i viceversa). És visible des del Pla Material quan està al Llindar Eteri (i viceversa). Tanmateix no pot afectar ni ésser afectat per res de l'altre pla.

action.name: Albir Terrorífic
entries: Tota criatura no no-morta a 60 peus de the ghost que pugui veure'l ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli estarà {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Qui falli per més de 5 també envelleix {@dice 1d4 × 10} anys. Les criatures {@condition acovardit} poden repetir la salvada al final de cada torn, cancel·lan l'efecte {@condition acovardit} quan superin.Si un objectiu supera la salvada o se li acaba la condició, és immune a aquest ghost's Albir Terrorífic durant les properes 24 hores. The aging effect can be reversed with a  {@spell restabliment superior} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 13} or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitat} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost no pot ser objectiu de cap atac, conjur, o efecte excepte els que expulsen no-morts, and retè l'alineament, la Intel·ligència, la Saviesa, el Carisma, i la immunitat a ésser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}. La resta d'estadístiques són les de l'objectiu, però no en guanya els coneixements, trets de classes, o competències.

La possessió dura fins que el cos es quedi a 0 punts de toc, the ghost la cancel·li com a acció bonus, o the ghost sigui expulsat per un efecte com el de {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. Quan la possessió acaba the ghost reapareix en un espai lliure a 5 peus del cos. L'objectiu és immune a possessions d'aquest this ghost's durant 24 hores des que supera la salvada o la possessió acaba.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 50/100 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The badger has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The badger fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The bat can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition eixordat}.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The bat has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the boar es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un tusk, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Implacable (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Si the boar rep 10 de dany o menys i això el deixa a 0 punts de vida, es queda a 1 punt de cop.

action.name: Ullal
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí. Si el dany de verí deixa a l'objectiu a 0 punts de vida, l'objectiu s'estabilitza però estarà {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora, fins i tot després de recuperar punts de vida, i estarà {@condition paralitzat} mentre pateixi aquest {@condition emmetzinat}.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, i the snake no pot constrènyer a cap altre objectiu.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The crab pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 11} per escapar). The crab té dos claws, i cadascun només pot apresar  un objectiu.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The crocodile pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The crocodile fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu not {@condition grappled} by the crocodile. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

monster.name: Àguila Gegant
idiomes: understands Common and Auran but can't speak them

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The eagle has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eagle fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its talons.

monster.name: Giant Elk
idiomes: understands Common, Èlfic, Silvà but can't speak them

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the elk es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an 7 ({@dice 2d6}) dany extra. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition enderrocat} . {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The frog pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The frog pot arribar a saltar 20 peus de longitud i 10 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 11} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition encegat} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only un objectiu swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the goat es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Rampage

variant.name: Giant Lizard Traits
entries: Some giant lizards have one or both of the following traits:

entries.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizard pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)

entries.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The lizard pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The octopus has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Núvol de tinta (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

monster.name: Giant Owl
idiomes: understands Common, Èlfic, and Silvà but can't speak them

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The owl no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The owl has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada

trait.name: Olfacte Agut

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada

action.name: Mossegada

variant.name: Diseased Giant Rats
entries: Some giant rats carry vile diseases that they spread with their bites.

entries.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's punts de vida màxims decreases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's punts de vida màxims drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scorpion fa tres atacs: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). The scorpion té dos claws, i cadascun només pot apresar  un objectiu.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the sea horse es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 11} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The shark té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Si el dany de verí deixa a l'objectiu a 0 punts de vida, l'objectiu s'estabilitza però estarà {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora, fins i tot després de recuperar punts de vida, i estarà {@condition paralitzat} mentre pateixi aquest {@condition emmetzinat}.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. Com a acció, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 12} Força check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The toad pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Salt Dempeus

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de verí, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition encegat} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only un objectiu swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike terreny difícil. Each creature that starts its turn in that area ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 10} or have its speed reduced to 0 fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature i no està {@condition incapacitat}. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 10}. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its abast or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 10} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.name: Blinding Spittle {@recharge 5}
entries: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition encegat} until the end of the mouther's next turn.

will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hand is invisible)

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Silver Espasa Gran

On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell projecció astral} spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The glabrezu té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The glabrezu fa quatre atacs: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it fa dos atacs with its pincers and casts one spell.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). The glabrezu té dos pincers, i cadascun només pot apresar  un objectiu.

action.name: Fist

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A glabrezu has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d3} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, or one glabrezu.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè de Foc.
items.entry: The dragon exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Weakening Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or have disadvantage on Força-based attack rolls, Força checks, and Força saving throws durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Peülles

action.name: Alè de Petrifying {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, a target begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrificat} until freed by the  {@spell restabliment superior} spell or other magic.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the goristro es mou 15 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un gore, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 38 ({@damage 7d10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 21} or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Enteniment Laberíntic
entries: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The goristro té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The goristro fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The goristro fa tres atacs: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 21} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}45 ({@damage 7d10 + 7}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Gray Ooze
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The ooze pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Corrode Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.
The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the ooze es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un oily pool or wet rock .

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

variant.name: Psychic Gray Ooze
entries: A gray ooze that lives a long time can evolve to become more intelligent and develop limited psionic ability. Such occurrences are more common in gray oozes that live near psioncic creatures such as {@creature mind flayer||mind flayers}, suggesting that the ooze can sense and mimic psionic ability.
A psionic gray ooze has an intelligence score of 6 (-2), as well as the following additional action.

entries.name: Psychic Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: The ooze targets one creature that it can sense within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The slaad's és Saviesa ({@dc 14} per salvar conjur). The slaad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The slaad's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Slaad)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes (Només en forma de Slaad)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition fascinat} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell engarjolament}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell desig} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell restabliment superior} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitat} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The dragon pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The hag's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hag pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Invisible Passage
entries: The hag magically turns {@condition invisible} until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While {@condition invisible}, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with her.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Només Coven)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her habilitat de llançament de conjurs. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic i està {@condition encegat} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition encegat}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The slaad's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). The slaad pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or staff. Alternatively, it uses its Tirar Flama twice.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Slaad)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Slaad)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Tirar Flama
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc. The fire ignites flammable objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition fascinat} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell engarjolament}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell desig} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell restabliment superior} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitat} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

monster.name: Grell
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The grell fa dos atacs: one with its tentacles and one with its beak.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o estar {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. The {@condition emmetzinat} target is {@condition paralitzat}, and it can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} mentre duri aquesta presa. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can 't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The grick fa dos atacs: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The griffon fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Grimlock
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus or 10 ft. while deafened (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition eixordat} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The grimlock has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Spiked Bone Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell desig} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15/30 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sphinx és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Inescrutable
entries: L'esfinx és immune a efectes per a detectar pensaments i emocions, i qualsevol encanteri de divinació que rebutgi. Les tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa (Perspicàcia) tenen desavantatge.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The sphinx's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sphinx fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The veteran exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The harpy fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its club.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition fascinat} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitat}.

While {@condition fascinat} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitat} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition fascinat} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

monster.name: Hell Hound
idiomes: comprèn l'infernal però no el pot parlar

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The hound has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The hound té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de hound's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The hound exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The terror de cuirassa té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The terror de cuirassa is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell bola de foc}, {@spell escalfar el metall}, i {@spell lightning bolt}.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition emmetzinat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hezrou fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A hezrou has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 2d6} {@creature dretch||dretches} or one hezrou.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult hill giants like to hurl themselves bodily at smaller foes and crush them beneath their bulk. This ability is represented by the following action option.

entries.name: Squash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or Smaller creature. {@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) de dany contundent, the giant lands {@condition enderrocat} in the target's space, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}. The grapple ends early if the giant stands up.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hippogriff has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hippogriff fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Un cop per torn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant, o 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Un cop per torn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hobgoblin makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Un cop per torn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hobgoblin fa tres atacs cos a cos. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is Large or smaller, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitat}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Homunculus
idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o estar {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead {@condition emmetzinat} for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and {@condition inconscient} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The hook horror can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition eixordat}.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The hook horror has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Tirar Flama in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Forca
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or lose 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points a l'inici de cada torn seu due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 12} Saviesa (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Tirar Flama
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 150 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc. Si l'objectiu és un objecte inflamable que no és dut ni vestit, s'encèn.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The shark té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The hidra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Caps Múltiples
entries: The hidra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hidra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.
Whenever the hidra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hidra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hidra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hidra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hidra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hidra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The hyena té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de hyena's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa tres atacs: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Paret de Glaç {@recharge}
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque paret de glaç on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is {@condition incapacitat}. The creature then makes a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is {@condition incapacitat} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, la criatura ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

variant.name: Ice Devil Spear
entries: Some ice devils have the following action options.

entries.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs: one with its spear and one with its tail.

entries.name: Ice Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}, or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell núvol de boira}, requiring no material components. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany tallant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the mephit es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un shard of ice ordinary.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Frost Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot con de fred air. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics d'armes no platejades

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: El diablet pot, com a acció, o bé polimorfar-se en una bèstia similar a una rata (velocitat de 20 peus), un corb (velocitat de 20 peus, velocitat de vol de 60 peus), o una aranya (velocitat de 20 peus, velocitat d'escalada de 20 peus), o bé tornar a la seva forma veritable. Les estadístiques són sempre les mateixes excepte les velocitats. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El diablet pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: El diablet té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Fibló (Mossegada en forma de Bèstia)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Invisibilitat
entries: El diablet es torna {@condition invisible} màgicament fins que ataqui o fins que la seva concentració es trenqui (com si fos la d'un conjur). Tot equivament que dugui o vesteixi el diablet també es torna {@condition invisible}.

variant.name: Diablet Familiar
entries: Els diablets poden trobar-se al servei de conjuradors mortals, fent de consellers, espies, i familiars. Un diablet anima a l'amo a cometre actes de maldat amb l'esperança d'arrabassar-li l'ànima si es corromp. Són curiosament lleials als seus amos, i poden ser perillosos si veuen una amenaça pels seus mestres. Alguns diablets tenen el tret següent.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: El diablet pot entaular contracte per servir una altra criatura com a familiar, i forma un vincle telepàtic amb l'amo. Amb aquest vincle l'amo pot sentir tot el que senti l'imp mentre estiguin a 1 milla de distància o menys. Mentre estiguin a 10 peus d'abast, l'amo obtè la Resistència Màgica del diablet. Si el mestre viola els termes del contracte, el diablet pot finalitzar el seu servei, trencant el vincle telepàtic.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition fascinat}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Fiend)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be magically {@condition fascinat} for 1 day. The {@condition fascinat} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only un objectiu {@condition fascinat} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition fascinat} by it or a willing creature. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat. The target's punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The fiend magically enters the Pla Etèri from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
idiomes: understands Deep Speech però no pot parlar

trait.name: Detectar Consciència
entries: The intellect devourer pot sentir i localitzar qualsevol criatura a 300 peus d'abast amb una Intel·ligència de 3 o major. Cap barrera s'interposa excepte la protecció del conjur {@spell ment en blanc}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The intellect devourer makes one attack with its claws and uses Devour Intellect.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Devour Intellect
