entries: The intellect devourer designa una criatura a 10 peus que tingui cervell. Ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 12}. Si falla, rep ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic; a més, tira {@dice 3d6}. Si la puntuació d'Intel·ligència de l'objectiu és igual o major al resultat, esdevè 0. L'objectiu és {@condition atordit} fins que recuperi 1 o més punts d'Intel·ligència.

action.name: Body Thief
entries: The intellect devourer initiates an Intel·ligència contest with an {@condition incapacitat} humanoid within 5 feet of it that isn't protected by {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}. If it wins the contest, the intellect devourer magically consumes the target's brain, teleports into the target's skull, and takes control of the target's body. While inside a creature, the intellect devourer has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as its understanding of Deep Speech, its telepathy, and its traits. It otherwise adopts the target's statistics. It knows everything the creature knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the intellect devourer must leave it. A {@spell protegir del bé i del mal} spell cast on the body drives the intellect devourer out. The intellect devourer is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a {@spell desig}. By spending 5 feet of its movement, the intellect devourer can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies, unless its brain is restored within 1 round.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker
idiomes: understands Common but doesn't speak it

trait.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The stalker is {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The stalker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Iron Gòlem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the gòlem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The gòlem és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The gòlem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The gòlem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gòlem fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Espasa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: The gòlem exhales poisonous gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The jackal has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The jackal té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de jackal's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Jackalwere

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: Comú (no pot parlar in jackal form)

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specific Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The jackalwere has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The jackalwere té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de wolf's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Jackal or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Scimitar (Només en forma de Human or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 10}. Si falla, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition inconscient} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours. Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition fascinat} aren't affected by it.

monster.name: Kenku
idiomes: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The whale can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition eixordat}.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The whale pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The whale has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The knight fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Leadership (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is {@condition incapacitat}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the kobold té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kobold's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Kraken
idiomes: telepatía 120 peus però no pot parlar

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kraken pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Llibertat de Moviments
entries: The kraken ignores terreny difícil, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The kraken fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de the kraken, i rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de the kraken's. Si the kraken rep 50 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 25} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition enderrocat} a 10 peus d'abast de the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}. The kraken té deu tentacles, i cadascun pot apresar un objectiu.

action.name: Estimbar
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18} or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The kraken uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Núvol de tinta (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud s'extén per les cantonades, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Pla Etèri. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5/15 peus d'abast, one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Força check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reaction.name: Sticky Shield
entries: When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a atac armat cos a cos, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 11}, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. If the weapon's wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is {@condition grappled} while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a {@dc 11} Força check and succeeding.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The kuo-toa és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Pla Etèri. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kuo-toa fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Scepter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Pla Etèri. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: The kuo-toa adds its Saviesa modifier to its armor class.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kuo-toa makes one bite attack and two atacs desarmats.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The kuo-toa és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 2. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kuo-toa pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Pla Etèri. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kuo-toa fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its pincer staff.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Pincer Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Mentre duri aquesta presa, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The lamia's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament, requiring no material components.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lamia fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Intoxicating Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Saviesa saving throws and all ability checks.

monster.name: Lemure
idiomes: understands Infernal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El lemure pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Hellish Rejovenir
entries: A lemure that dies in els Nou Inferns comes back to life with all its hit points in {@dice 1d10} days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent

monster.name: Lich
idiomes: Common plus up to five other languages

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the lich falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The lich té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} against this magic o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} against this magic. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The lion has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The lion té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de lion's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el lion es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el lion pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

trait.name: Skewer
entries: Un cop per torn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizardfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

trait.name: Skewer
entries: Un cop per torn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizardfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Heavy Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Només en forma de Lizardfolk)
headerEntries: The lizardfolk és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The lizardfolk has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The lizardfolk pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Lizardfolk)
entries: The lizardfolk fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant in {@creature crocodile} form. If the lizardfolk is in crocodile form and the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the lizardfolk can't bite another target. If the lizardfolk reverts to its true form, the grapple ends.

action.name: Urpes (Només en forma de Lizardfolk)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Canviar de Forma (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The lizardfolk magically polymorphs into a {@creature crocodile}, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The mage és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Familiars
entries: Any spellcaster that can cast the {@spell trobar familiar} spell (such as an archmage or mage) is likely to have a familiar. The familiar can be one of the creatures described in the spell (see the Player's Handbook) or some other Tiny monster, such as a {@creature ma reptadora}, {@creature imp}, {@creature pseudodragon}, o {@creature quasit}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell escalfar el metall} ({@dc 10} salvació de conjur), requiring no material components. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the mephit es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un mound of magma ordinary.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Alè de Foc {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the magmin dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}. Qui falli rep 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Flammable objects que ningú estigui portant o vestint in that area are ignited.

trait.name: Ignited Illumination
entries: Com a acció bonus, the magmin can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the magmin desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

action.name: Tocar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Fins que una criatura, com a acció, apagui el foc, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc al final de cada torn seu.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: Si el mamut es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Tossada, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 18}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el mamut pot fer un atac Esclafar com a acció bonus.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition enderrocat} . {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Manes
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The mantícora has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the mantícora finishes a long rest.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mantícora fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws or three with its tail spikes.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 100/200 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The marid és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The marid pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany perforant, o 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. On a failure, a target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany contundent and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked {@condition enderrocat}. On a success, a target takes half the dany contundent, but is neither pushed nor knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

variant.name: Genie Powers
entries: Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.

entries.name: Disguises
entries: Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the {@spell ego camuflatge} spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the {@spell polimorfia veritable} spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well.

entries.name: Wishes
entries: The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year), and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence.

To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the {@spell desig} spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The marilith té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The marilith's són màgics.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The marilith can make seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make atac de cuas against other targets.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A marilith has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d6} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d4} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, {@dice 1d3} {@creature glabrezu||glabrezus}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature nalfeshnee||nalfeshnees}, or one marilith.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The mastiff has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 11} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: Si una criatura que pugui veure la medusa comença el torn a 30 peus seus, la medusa pot forçar-la a salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Per poder fer-ho, la medusa no pot estar {@condition incapacitat} i ha de poder veure la criatura. Si la criatura falla per més de 5, es {@condition petrificat} immediatament. Si falla per menys es comença a tornar de pedra i està {@condition restrained}. La criatura {@condition restrained} ha de repetir la salvada a l'inici del seu proper torn. Si falla, estarà {@condition petrificat}. Si supera, l'efecte es cancel·la. La petrificació continuarà fins que un efecte màgic com ara {@spell restabliment superior} la cancel·li.

Una criatura no sorpresa pot desviar la mirada per evitar la salvada al principi del seu torn. Si ho fa, no veurà la medusa fins el principi del seu proper torn (on pot tornar a desviar la mirada). Si en algun moment la criatura mira a la medusa, ha de salvar immediatament.
Si la medusa es veu el reflexe a una superfície polida a 30 metres d'abast en una àrea de llum forta es veurà afectada per la seva pròpia maledicció.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The medusa makes either three melee attacks—one with its snake hair and two with its shortsword—or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The merfolk pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The merrow pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The merrow fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Força contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The mezzoloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 11} per salvar conjur). The mezzoloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mezzoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The mezzoloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mezzoloth fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its trident.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant when held with two claws and used to make a melee attack.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth attempts a magical summoning.
A mezzoloth has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning one mezzoloth.

A summoned yugoloth apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Adhesive (Només en forma d'objecte)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it ({@dc 13} per escapar). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença (Només en forma d'objecte)
entries: Quan the mimic es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un object ordinary.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany d'àcid.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The mind flayer és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mind flayer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) iha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition atordit} mentre duri aquesta presa.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitat} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The mind flayer és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The mind flayer és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència (save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The mind flayer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mind flayer té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) iha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition atordit} mentre duri aquesta presa.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitat} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the minotaure es mou 10 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un gore, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Enteniment Laberíntic
entries: The minotaure can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, the minotaure can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Minotaure Skeleton
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the skeleton es mou 10 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un gore, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the mephit es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un mound of mud ordinary.

action.name: Fists
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mud Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit belches viscid mud onto one creature within 5 feet of it. If the target is Medium or smaller, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition restrained} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The mule has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Mòmia
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its punts de vida màxims decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's punts de vida màxims to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} against this magic or become {@condition acovardit} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralitzat} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not senyors de les mòmies) for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Senyor de les Mòmies
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The senyor de les mòmies és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The senyor de les mòmies has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The senyor de les mòmies té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: A destroyed senyor de les mòmies gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the senyor de les mòmies's heart.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its punts de vida màxims decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's punts de vida màxims to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The senyor de les mòmies targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the senyor de les mòmies, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} against this magic or become {@condition acovardit} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralitzat} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and senyors de les mòmies for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The senyor de les mòmies makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.name: Blinding Dust
entries: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the senyor de les mòmies. Each creature within 5 feet of the senyor de les mòmies ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition encegat} until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.name: Blasphemous Word (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the senyor de les mòmies that can hear the magical utterance ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition atordit} until the end of the senyor de les mòmies's next turn.

legendary.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the senyor de les mòmies, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the senyor de les mòmies's next turn.

legendary.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The senyor de les mòmies magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the senyor de les mòmies is immune to all damage, and it can't be {@condition grappled}, {@condition petrificat}, knocked {@condition enderrocat}, {@condition restrained}, o {@condition atordit}. Equipment worn or carried by the senyor de les mòmies remain in its possession.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent mes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Dia)
entries: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intel·ligència of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

variant.name: Zuggtomoy's Empowerment
entries: Myconids that embrace {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} can develop new, more destructive kinds of spores. Myconid adults can have two of the following spore effects.

entries.name: Caustic Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores en un con de 30 peus. Each creature inside the cone ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11} or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the myconid's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Infestació Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers durant 1 minut. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy) and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast.

entries.name: Euphoria Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases a cloud of spores in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Other creatures in that area must each succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitució saving throw or become {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. A creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect early on itself on a success. When the effect ends on it, the creature gains one level of {@condition exhaust}.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 3d4 + 1}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 3d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Animating Spores (3/Dia)
entries: The myconid targets one corpse of a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant. The corpse stays animated for {@dice 1d4 + 1} weeks or until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

action.name: Hallucination Spores
entries: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. The {@condition emmetzinat} target is {@condition incapacitat} while it hallucinates. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Pacifying Spores
entries: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: A 30-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intel·ligència of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

variant.name: Zuggtomoy's Empowerment
entries: Myconids that embrace {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} can develop new, more destructive kinds of spores. Myconid sovereigns have all these spore effects.

entries.name: Caustic Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores en un con de 30 peus. Each creature inside the cone ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12} or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the myconid's turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Infestació Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on it, and the cloud lingers durant 1 minut. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy) and also gains a random form of indefinite madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of {@creature Zuggtmoy|MTF} table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast.

entries.name: Euphoria Spores (1/Dia)
entries: The myconid releases a cloud of spores in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Other creatures in that area must each succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitució saving throw or become {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. The save DC is 8 + the myconid's Constitució modifier + the myconid's proficiency bonus. A creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect early on itself on a success. When the effect ends on it, the creature gains one level of {@condition exhaust}.

trait.name: Distress Spores
entries: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany contundent mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Rapport Spores (3/Dia)
entries: A 10-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intel·ligència of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The nalfeshnee té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Horror Nimbus {@recharge 5}
entries: The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A nalfeshnee has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} {@creature vrock||vrocks}, {@dice 1d3} {@creature hezrou||hezrous}, {@dice 1d2} {@creature glabrezu||glabrezus}, or one nalfeshnee.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Needle Plaga
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
idiomes: understands Common però no pot parlar

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Needles
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The hag és Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The hag té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Night Hag Items
entries: A night hag carries two very rare magic items that she must craft for herself. If either object is lost, the night hag will go to great lengths to retrieve it, as creating a new tool takes time and effort.
Heartstone: This lustrous black gem allows a night hag to become ethereal while it is in her possession. The touch of a heartstone also cures any disease. Crafting a heartstone takes 30 days.

Soul Bag: When an evil humanoid dies as a result of a night hag's Nightmare Haunting, the hag catches the soul in this black sack made of stitched flesh. A soul bag can hold only one evil soul at a time, and only the night hag who crafted the bag can catch a soul with it. Crafting a soul bag takes 7 days and a humanoid sacrifice (whose flesh is used to make the bag).

action.name: Urpes (Només en forma de Hag)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The hag magically enters the Pla Etèri from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Dia)
entries: While on the Pla Etèri, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A {@spell protegir del bé i del mal} spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its punts de vida màxims is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If this effect reduces the target's punts de vida màxims to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's punts de vida màxims lasts until removed by the  {@spell restabliment superior} spell or similar magic.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Només Coven)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her habilitat de llançament de conjurs. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic i està {@condition encegat} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition encegat}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

monster.name: Nightmare
idiomes: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Confer Fire Resistència
entries: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The nightmare desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Ethereal Stride
entries: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Pla Etèri from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The nothic has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nothic fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rotting Gaze
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Weird Insight
entries: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must contest its Carisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Saviesa (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being {@condition fascinat}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The nycaloth és Carisma. The nycaloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The nycaloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The nycaloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant a l'inici de cada torn seu due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 2d4}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Saviesa (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A nycaloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} {@creature mezzoloth||mezzoloths} or one nycaloth.

A summoned yugoloth apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

monster.name: Ochre Jelly
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The jelly pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The jelly pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, (arrodoneix a la baixa). New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
entries: The octopus has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 10} per escapar). Mentre duri aquesta presa, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Núvol de tinta (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Ogre Zombie
idiomes: understands Common and Giant però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: Si hi ha dany que redueix al zombi a 0 punts de vida, ha de salvar Constitució amb CD de 5 + el dany rebut (si el dany no és radiant o crític). Si supera, el zombi es queda amb 1 punt de cop i no 0.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The oni's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). The oni pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The oni's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The oni recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The oni fa dos atacs, either with its claws or its glaive.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Oni)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant in Small or Medium form.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded en forma d'humanoide. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The orc és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@dice 1d6 + 3} plus {@dice 1d8}) de dany perforant, o 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.
