trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Gruumsh's Fury
entries: The orc deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orc fa dos atacs with its greataxe or its spear.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d12 + 4} plus {@damage 1d8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d6 + 4} plus {@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Battle Cry (1/Dia)
entries: Each creature of the war chief's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Telepatia Limitada
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The otyugh fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} against disease or become {@condition emmetzinat} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its punts de vida màxims by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its punts de vida màxims to 0. Aquesta reducció de punts de vida màxims dura fins que the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Batre Tencacle
entries: The otyugh slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or take 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent and be {@condition atordit} until the end of the otyugh's next turn. Si supera, the target takes half the dany contundent i no està {@condition atordit}.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The owl no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The owl has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The owlbear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista or smell.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The owlbear fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its claws.

Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el panther pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the pentadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Paralysis Gas {@recharge 5}
entries: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

idiomes: understands Common and Èlfic però no pot parlar

trait.name: Atac en Picat
entries: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a atac armat cos a cos, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The peryton has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista or smell.

Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Si el dany de verí deixa a l'objectiu a 0 punts de vida, l'objectiu s'estabilitza però estarà {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora, fins i tot després de recuperar punts de vida, i estarà {@condition paralitzat} mentre pateixi aquest {@condition emmetzinat}.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença

action.name: Drop

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21}, unless the pit fiend is {@condition incapacitat}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition acovardit} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The pit fiend té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The pit fiend's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Mossegada

The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} or become {@condition emmetzinat}. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí a l'inici de cada torn seu. L'objectiu {@condition emmetzinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The poltergeist pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the poltergeist té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The poltergeist is {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Forceful Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries: The poltergeist targets a creature or unattended object within 30 feet of it. A creature must be Medium or smaller to be affected by this magic, and an object can weigh up to 150 pounds.

If the target is a creature, the poltergeist makes a Carisma check contested by the target's Força check. If the poltergeist wins the contest, the poltergeist hurls the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward. If the target then comes into contact with a hard surface or heavy object, l'objectiu rep {@dice 1d6} damage per 10 feet moved.

If the target is an object that isn't being worn or carried, the poltergeist hurls it up to 30 feet in any direction. The poltergeist can use the object as a ranged weapon, attacking one creature along the object's path ({@hit 4} a impactar) and dealing 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent on a hit.

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: Com a acció bonus, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its atacs armats cos a cos to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany radiant to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, el dany extra incrementa en {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia

If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition inconscient} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

variant.name: Pseudodragon Familiar
entries: Some pseudodragons are willing to serve spellcasters as a familiar. Such pseudodragons have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragon's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The pteranòdon no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The worm fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19} or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition encegat} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the worm's turns.

Si the worm rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition enderrocat} a 10 peus d'abast de the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 feet fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The quasit té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Urpa (Mossegada en forma de Bèstia)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de verí and become {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Scare (1/Dia)
entries: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. The target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the quasit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The quasit magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses Scare, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the quasit wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

variant.name: Quasit Familiar
entries: Mortal spellcasters interested in extraplanar familiars find quasits easy to summon and eager to serve. The quasit plays the part of the obsequious servant. It serves its master well, but it goads the mortal to greater and greater acts of chaos and evil. Such quasits have the following trait.

entries.name: Familiar
entries: The quasit can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the quasit senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the quasit is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the quasit's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the quasit can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant, and the target is cursed if it is a creature. The magical curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell or similar magic.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The rat has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 10} Saviesa (Insight) check.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The slaad recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The slaad fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be infected with a disease—a minuscule slaad egg.

A humanoid host can carry only one slaad egg to term at a time. Over three months, the egg moves to the chest cavity, gestates, and forms a slaad tadpole. In the 24-hour period before giving birth, the host starts to feel unwell, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. At birth, the tadpole chews its way through vital organs and out of the host's chest in 1 round, killing the host in the process.
If the disease is cured before the tadpole's emergence, the unborn slaad is disintegrated.

variant.name: Control Gem
entries: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being {@condition fascinat} while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against {@spell engarjolament}, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A {@spell desig} spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A {@spell restabliment superior} spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Saviesa (Medicine) can remove the gem from an {@condition incapacitat} slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful {@dc 20} Saviesa (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic to the slaad.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The shark té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de shark's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Escalfor Corporal
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 17} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de the remorhaz, i rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de the remorhaz's.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition enderrocat} in a space within 10 feet oft he remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

monster.name: Revenant
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The revenant recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a {@spell desig} spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: The revenant és immune als efectes que expulsin no-morts.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The revenant makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany contundent. Instead of dealing damage, the revenant can grapple the target ({@dc 14} per escapar) provided the target is Large or smaller.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralitzat} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition acovardit} of the revenant durant 1 minut. The {@condition acovardit} target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition acovardit} condition on itself on a success.

variant.name: Revenants with Spells and Weapons
entries: Revenants that were spellcasters before they died might retain some or all of their spellcasting capabilities. Similarly, revenants that wore armor and wielded weapons in life might continue to do so.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the rhinoceros es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un gore, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The roc fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si roper es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

trait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Força check against it.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The roper pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The roper fa quatre atacs with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 50 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). Durant aquesta presa, l'objectiu també està {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on Força checks and Força saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

action.name: Reel
entries: The roper pulls each creature {@condition grappled} by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

monster.name: Rug of Smothering
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Debilitat Antimàgica
entries: The rug is {@condition incapacitat} while in the area of an camp antimàgic. If targeted by dissipar màgia, the rug must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature {@condition grappled} by the rug takes the other half.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si rug es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal rug.

action.name: Smother
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, {@condition encegat}, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Aroma de Ferro
entries: The rust monster can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the rust monster corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Non magical ammunition made of metal that hits the rust monster is destroyed after dealing damage.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Antennae
entries: The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 11} Destresa saving throw to avoid the rust monster's touch.

If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The tiger has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el tiger es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 14}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el tiger pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The sahuagin té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Mig Amfibi
entries: The sahuagin pot respirar aire i a l'aigua, però ha de submergir-se cada 4 hores per evitar sufocar-se.

trait.name: Shark Telepatia
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The sahuagin té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Mig Amfibi
entries: The sahuagin pot respirar aire i a l'aigua, però ha de submergir-se cada 4 hores per evitar sufocar-se.

trait.name: Shark Telepatia
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sahuagin fa tres atacs: one with his bite and two with his claws or trident.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The sahuagin és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The sahuagin té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Mig Amfibi
entries: The sahuagin pot respirar aire i a l'aigua, però ha de submergir-se cada 4 hores per evitar sufocar-se.

trait.name: Shark Telepatia
entries: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Escalfor Corporal
entries: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc on a hit (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The salamander fa dos atacs: one with its spear and one with its tail.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander can't make atac de cuas against other targets.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The satyr té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Satyr Pipes
entries: A satyr might carry panpipes that it can play to create magical effects. Usually, only one satyr in a group carries such pipes. If a satyr has pipes, it gains the following additional action option.

entries.name: Panpipes
entries: The satyr plays its pipes and chooses one of the following magical effects: a charming melody, a frightening strain, or a gentle lullaby. Any creature within 60 feet of the satyr that can hear the pipes ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be affected as described below. Other satyrs and creature that can't be {@condition fascinat} are unaffected

An affected creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to these panpipes for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Charming Melody
entries: The creature is {@condition fascinat} by the satyr durant 1 minut. If the satyr or any of its companions harms the creature, the effect on it ends immediately.

entries.name: Frightening Strain
entries: The creature is {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut.

entries.name: Gentle Lullaby
entries: The creature falls asleep i està {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.

monster.name: Scarecrow
idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the scarecrow es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un , inanimate scarecrow ordinary.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scarecrow fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be {@condition acovardit} until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

action.name: Terrifying Glare
entries: The scarecrow targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the scarecrow, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} or be magically {@condition acovardit} until the end of the scarecrow's next turn. The {@condition acovardit} target is {@condition paralitzat}.

action.name: Fiblar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 9}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, ranged 150/600 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hag pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. A creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a hag's Horrific Appearance durant les properes 24 hores.

Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the hag's true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Death Glare
entries: The hag targets one {@condition acovardit} creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the hag, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11} against this magic or drop to 0 hit points.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 16} Intel·ligència (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

variant.name: Hag Covens
entries: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

entries.name: Shared Spellcasting (Només Coven)
headerEntries: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
footerEntries: For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her habilitat de llançament de conjurs. The spell save DC is 12 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4 + the hag's Intel·ligència modifier.

entries.name: Hag Eye
entries: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes {@dice 3d10} de dany psíquic i està {@condition encegat} for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while {@condition encegat}. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The shadow pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: the shadow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Força Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic, and the target's Força score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Força to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The demon pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic.

monster.name: Shambling Mound
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Absorbir Electricitat
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it. The engulfed target is {@condition encegat}, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, iha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

monster.name: Shield Guardian
idiomes: understands commands given in any language però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bound
entries: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (arrodoneix a l'alta) is transferred to the guardian.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The shield guardian recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si té 1 punt de cop com a mínim.

trait.name: Spell Storing
entries: A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the guardian casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, sense requerir components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The guardian makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Escut
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the wearer of the guardian's amulet, the guardian grants a +2 bonus to the wearer's AC if the guardian is within 5 feet of the wearer.

monster.name: Shrieker
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the shrieker es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un fungus ordinary.

action.name: Shriek
entries: When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for {@dice 1d4} of the shrieker's turns afterward.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè Gèlid.
items.entry: The dragon exhales an icy blast en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Esquelet
idiomes: comprèn els idiomes que comprenia en vida però no pot parlar

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Slaad Tadpole
idiomes: understands Slaad però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The slaad té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell llums dansaires}, requiring no material components. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts durant 1 minut.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cinder Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10} or be {@condition encegat} until the end of the mephit's next turn.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The solar's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 25} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

3e: {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Armes Angelicals
entries: Els atacs armats de The solar's són màgics. Quan the solar impacta amb qualsevol arma, fa {@dice 6d8} de dany radiant extra (inclòs a l'atac).

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The solar té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Slaying Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany radiant. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or die.

action.name: Flying Sword
entries: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (4/Dia)
entries: The solar touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Searing Burst (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany radiant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Blinding Gaze (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition encegat} until magic such as the {@spell restabliment menor} spell removes the blindness.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rajos d'Ull
entries: The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.

items.name: 1. Confusion Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13}, or it can't take reactions fins el final del seu proper torn. On its turn, the target can't move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target can't attack, it does nothing on its turn.

items.name: 2. Paralyzing Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 3. Fear Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. The target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the spectator is visible to the target, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 4. Wounding Ray.
items.entry: L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Crear Menjar i Aigua
entries: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monster.name: Specter
idiomes: understands all languages it knew in life però no pot parlar

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The specter pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the specter té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} or se li redueixen tants punts de vida màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The spider pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 9} o take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de verí.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El devil pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The devil té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The devil fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Forca
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/80 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The naga és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell desig} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 31 ({@damage 7d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 40/160 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 10} o become {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the {@condition emmetzinat} target falls {@condition inconscient} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Heart Sight
entries: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a {@dc 10} Carisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

action.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The sprite magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of its turns, the spy pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't {@condition incapacitat} and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spy fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Dia)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell difuminar}, requiring no material components. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma.

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10} or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany tallant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: Summon Mephits (1/Dia)
entries: The mephit has a {@chance 25|25 percent|25% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d4} mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) hit points due to blood loss.

The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw, catch the missile and take no dany contundent from it.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult stone giants like to grab enemies and fling them through the air. They can also roll boulders across the ground, striking multiple enemies in a line. These abilities are represented by the following action options.

entries.name: Estimbar
entries: The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17} or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice and land {@condition enderrocat}, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown.

entries.name: Rolling Rock
entries: The giant sends a rock tumbling along the ground en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}, taking 22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent and falling {@condition enderrocat} on a failed save

monster.name: Stone Gòlem

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The gòlem és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The gòlem té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The gòlem's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gòlem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
entries: The gòlem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic. Si falla, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last durant 1 minut. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The giant's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The giant pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Llança de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

variant.name: New Giant Options
entries: Some adult storm giants can channel thunderous power through their bodies and release it with a deafening stomp. This ability is represented by the following action option.

entries.name: Thunderous Stomp {@recharge}
entries: The storm giant stomps the ground, triggering a Esclat de Tro. All other creatures within 15 feet of the giant ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany de tro and be {@condition eixordat} until the start of the giant's next turn. Qui superi en rep la meitat i no està {@condition eixordat}. The Esclat de Tro can be heard out to a range of 1,200 feet.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has {@condition fascinat}. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Fiend)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Charm
entries: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be magically {@condition fascinat} for 1 day. The {@condition fascinat} target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only un objectiu {@condition fascinat} at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

action.name: Draining Kiss
entries: The fiend kisses a creature {@condition fascinat} by it or a willing creature. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} against this magic, taking 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat. The target's punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The fiend magically enters the Pla Etèri from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The swarm can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition eixordat}.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The swarm has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant, o 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

A creature reduced to 0 hit points by a swarm of centipedes is stable but {@condition emmetzinat} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and {@condition paralitzat} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant, o 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: The swarm té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The swarm has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant, o 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Beaks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant, o 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The swarm pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the tarrasque falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The tarrasque té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a {@spell missil màgic} spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The tarrasque fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tarrasque can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa cinc atacs: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 20} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Banyes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 20} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. A creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a tarrasque's Presència Aterradora durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de the tarrasque, i rep 56 ({@damage 16d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de the tarrasque's.

Si the tarrasque rep 60 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition enderrocat} a 10 peus d'abast de the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or atac de cua.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

trait.name: Chameleon Carapace
entries: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The thri-kreen pot arribar a saltar 30 peus de longitud i 15 peus d'alçada. no li cal agafar embranzida.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thri-kreen fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 11} o estar {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralitzat} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way. L'objectiu {@condition emmetzinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Thri-kreen Weapons and Psionics
entries: Some thri-kreen employ special martial weapons. A gythka is a two-handed polearm with a blade at each end. A chatkcha is a flat, triangular wedge with three serrated blades (a light thrown weapon). A thri-kreen armed with a gythka and chatkchas gains the following action options:

entries.name: Weapons Multiattack
entries: The thri-kreen makes two gythka attacks or two chatkcha attacks.

entries.name: Gythka
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

entries.name: Chatkcha
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.
A few thri-kreen manifest psionic abilities, using their powers to aid the hunt and communicate more easily with outsiders.
A psionic thri-kreen has telepathy out to a range of 60 feet and gains the following additional trait:

entries.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The thri-kreen's habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Saviesa. The thri-kreen pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hi està {@condition invisible})

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The thug té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de thug's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thug fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The tiger has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el tiger es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el tiger pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si treant es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal tree.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The treant fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The treant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 60/180 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Dia)
entries: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a {@creature treant}, except they have Intel·ligència and Carisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant.
