The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The warrior té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de warrior's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: Si el triceratops es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Tossada, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 13}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el triceratops pot fer un atac Esclafar com a acció bonus.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura {@condition enderrocat} . {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent

trait.name: Ideologia Axiomàtica
entries: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Desintegració
entries: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

variant.name: Rogue Modrons
entries: A modron unit sometimes becomes defective, either through natural decay or exposure to chaotic forces. Rogue modrons don't act in accordance with Primus's wishes and directives, breaking laws, disobeying orders, and even engaging in violence. Other modrons hunt down such rogues.
A rogue modron loses the Axiomatic Mind trait and can have any alignment other than lawful neutral. Otherwise, it has the same statistics as a regular modron of its rank.

trait.name: Pell Camaleònica
entries: The troglodyte has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition emmetzinat} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the troglodyte té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troglodyte fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The troll has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The troll recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Loathsome Limbs
entries: Whenever the troll takes at least 15 slashing damage at one time, roll a {@dice d20} to determine what else happens to it:

items.name: 1–10:
items.entry: Nothing else happens.

items.name: 11–14:
items.entry: One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.

items.name: 15–18:
items.entry: One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.

items.name: 19–20:
items.entry: The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

entries: If the troll finishes a short or long rest without reattaching a severed limb or head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneració trait.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.

A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is {@condition encegat} unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's Keen Smell trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.

The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls {@condition enderrocat}. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

monster.name: Twig Plaga
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)
idiomes: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si blight es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un dead shrub.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tyrannosaurus fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 17} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The ultroloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). The ultroloth pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ultroloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The ultroloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and fa tres atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Hypnotic Gaze
entries: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic or be {@condition fascinat} until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The {@condition fascinat} target is {@condition atordit}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

variant.name: Yugoloth Summoning
entries: Some yugoloths have an action option that allows them to summon other yugoloths.

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Dia)
entries: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
An ultroloth has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 1d6} {@creature mezzoloth||mezzoloths}, {@dice 1d4} {@creature nycaloth||nycaloths}, or one ultroloth.

A summoned yugoloth apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

trait.name: Confusing Gaze
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a {@dc 15} Carisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is {@condition incapacitat}.

On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The umber hulk fa tres atacs: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The unicorn és Carisma ({@dc 14} per salvar conjur). The unicorn pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

1e: {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the unicorn es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un horn, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The unicorn té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The unicorn's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The unicorn fa dos atacs: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (3/Dia)
entries: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleportar (1/Dia)
entries: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary.name: Peülles
entries: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary.name: Escut de Pampallugues (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary.name: Auto Curació (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The unicorn magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.

monster.name: Vampire
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has una velocitat de vol de 20 peus, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the vampire falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When it es queda a 0 punts de vida outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling {@condition inconscient}, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must abast its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then {@condition paralitzat} until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The vampire recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The vampire pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Prohibició.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is {@condition incapacitat} in its resting place, the vampire is {@condition paralitzat} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. it té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Vampire)
entries: The vampire fa dos atacs, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.name: Atac Desarmat (Només en forma de Vampire)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target ({@dc 18} per escapar).

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Bat or Vampire)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura voluntària o una criatura que estigui {@condition grappled} pel vampir, {@condition incapacitat}, o {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. Els punts de vida màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, i el vampir en recupera aquest número. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un descans llarg. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under the vampire's control.

action.name: Charm
entries: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} against this magic or be {@condition fascinat} pel vampir. The {@condition fascinat} target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Dia)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf||wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The vampire moves up to its speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: The vampire makes one atac desarmat.

legendary.name: Mossegada (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The vampire makes one bite attack.

Els punts de vida màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, i el vampir en recupera aquest número. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un descans llarg. idiomes: the languages it knew in life

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Vine Plaga
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si blight es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un tangle of vines.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, and a Large or smaller target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the blight can't constrict another target.

action.name: Entangling Plants {@recharge 5}
entries: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is terreny difícil for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 12} or become {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Força check, freeing it self or another entangled creature within abast on a success.

monster.name: Violet Fungus
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Quan the violet fungus es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un fungus ordinary.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fungus makes {@dice 1d4} Rotting Touch attacks.

action.name: Rotting Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The vrock té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The vrock fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spores {@recharge}
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or become {@condition emmetzinat}. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, a target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de verí a l'inici de cada torn seu. A target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

action.name: Stunning Screech (1/Dia)
entries: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition atordit} until the end of the vrock's next turn.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A vrock has a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of summoning {@dice 2d4} {@creature dretch||dretches} or one vrock.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The vulture has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista or smell.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The vulture té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de vulture's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}. If the target is {@condition enderrocat}, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

variant.name: Warhorse Armor
entries: An armored warhorse has an AC based on the type of barding worn (see the Player's Handbook for more information on barding). The horse's AC includes its Destresa modifier, where applicable. Barding doesn't alter the horse's challenge rating.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Whelm {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15}. On a failure, a target takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. If it is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. A l'inici de cada torn de the elemental, each target {@condition grappled} by it takes 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a {@dc 14} Força check and succeeding.

trait.name: Invisible in Water
entries: The water weird is {@condition invisible} while fully immersed in water.

trait.name: Water Bound
entries: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The weasel has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Werebear

walk.condition: (40 ft., climb 30 ft. in bear or hybrid form)

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: Comú (no pot parlar in bear form)

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The werebear has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: In bear form, the werebear fa dos atacs d'Urpa. En forma d'humanoide, it makes two greataxe attacks. En forma híbrida, it can attack like a bear or a humanoid.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Bear or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be cursed with were bear lycanthropy.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Bear or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Greataxe (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

variant.name: Nonhuman Lycanthropes
entries: The statistics presented in this section assume a base creature of human. However, you can also use the statistics to represent nonhuman lycanthropes, adding verisimilitude by allowing a nonhuman lycanthrope to retain one or more of its humanoid racial traits. For example, an elf home-llop might have the Fey Ancestry trait.

monster.name: Wereboar

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: Comú (no pot parlar in boar form)

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. A part de la CA, les seves estadístiques son iguals a les dues formes. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Charge (Només en forma de Boar or Hybrid)
entries: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Implacable (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Si the wereboar rep 14 de dany o menys i això el deixa a 0 punts de vida, es queda a 1 punt de cop.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: The wereboar fa dos atacs, only one of which can be with its tusks.

action.name: Maul (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ullals (Només en forma de Boar or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.

variant.name: Nonhuman Lycanthropes
entries: The statistics presented in this section assume a base creature of human. However, you can also use the statistics to represent nonhuman lycanthropes, adding verisimilitude by allowing a nonhuman lycanthrope to retain one or more of its humanoid racial traits. For example, an elf home-llop might have the Fey Ancestry trait.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)

action.name: Shortsword (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

entries: Si el weretiger es mou, com a mínim, 15 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 14}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el weretiger pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Humanoid or Hybrid)
entries: En forma d'humanoide, the weretiger makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks. En forma híbrida, it can attack like a humanoid or make two claw attacks.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Tiger or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a humanoid, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.

action.name: Urpa (Només en forma de Tiger or Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes (Només en forma de Hybrid)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear (Només en Forma Humanoide)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Alè de Cold {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Wight

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the wight té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Drenar Vida in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or se li redueixen tants punts de vida màxims com dany hagi rebut. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Will-o'-Wisp
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Consume Life
entries: Com a acció bonus, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 10} against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Ephemeral
entries: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The will-o'-wisp pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.name: Shock
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Invisibilitat
entries: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the kobold té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kobold té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kobold's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Dropped Rock

entries: The wolf has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The wolf té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de wolf's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The wolf has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Alè de Cold {@recharge 5}
entries: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

entries: The wolf has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 11} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The worg has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

action.name: Create Specter
entries: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a {@creature specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The {@creature specter} is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wyvern fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can use its claws in place of one other attack.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The xorn has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Treasure Sense
entries: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The xorn fa tres atacs d'Urpa.and one bite attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Fear of Fire
entries: Si the yeti rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The yeti has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred and then be {@condition paralitzat} for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The yochlol's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). The yochlol pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The yochlol té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The yochlol pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yochlol fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, abast 5 ft. (10 feet in demon form), un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Mist Form
entries: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the yochlol is {@condition incapacitat} and can't speak. It has una velocitat de vol de 30 peus, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or be {@condition emmetzinat} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target is {@condition incapacitat}.

variant.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A yochlol has a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of summoning one yochlol.

A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

items.entry: The dragon exhales gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Si falla, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last durant 1 minut. The creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Només en forma de Abomination)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The yuan-ti's és Saviesa ({@dc 15} per salvar conjur). The yuan-ti pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The yuan-ti té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Abomination)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

action.name: Mossegada

action.name: Constrènyer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.
